age_err_msg: Please enter a valid age between 1 and 100.
marathons_err_msg: Please select at least one marathon for comparison.
server_err_msg: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
network_err_msg: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
introduce_contents: Compare your performance with runners around the world.
privacy_policy_contents:
We value your privacy. This service collects your running time, age, gender, and selected reference marathons only for the purpose of calculating your performance ranking.

However, none of this information is stored on our servers. All data is used temporarily during the session and is discarded immediately after the result is shown.

We do not store, share, or track any user data. No analytics tools or third-party tracking technologies are used.

If you have any questions about this privacy policy, feel free to contact us.
terms_of_use_contents:
Please read these Terms of Use ("Terms") carefully before using this application ("App"). By accessing or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

1. Use of the App
This App is provided for personal, non-commercial use only. You may not use the App in any way that is unlawful or prohibited by these Terms.

2. Features and Data Sources
This App provides performance comparison and ranking features based on publicly available marathon race data. While efforts are made to keep the data accurate and up to date, we do not guarantee the completeness or real-time accuracy of any results.

3. Advertisements
This App may display third-party advertisements. These ads are managed by external providers, and we are not responsible for the content or practices of those providers. Clicking on ads is entirely voluntary.

4. Privacy
We collect user input such as running records, gender, and age only during the session for calculation purposes. This data is not stored on our servers. For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

5. Intellectual Property
All content, images, code, and design elements in the App are either original or legally licensed. Any reproduction, distribution, or reverse engineering of the App is strictly prohibited.

6. Limitation of Liability
The App is provided "as is" without any warranties. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use the App.

7. Changes to These Terms
We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the App after changes indicates your acceptance of the updated Terms.

8. Governing Law
These Terms shall be governed by and interpreted under the laws of the Republic of Korea, without regard to conflict of law principles.

9. Contact
If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms, please feel free to contact us.
cookie_preferences_contents:
This app does not use cookies directly. However, third-party advertisements shown in the app may use cookies, mobile identifiers, or similar technologies to personalize ads and measure their performance.

When you enter your running data, it is processed temporarily and never stored. No cookies or related data are saved by us.

Please note that any cookies or tracking technologies used by advertising partners are managed by those third parties, and we do not control or access them.

You can usually manage your ad or privacy preferences through your device or browser settings.
